about.short: Apex Legends is a fast-paced free-to-play battle royale featuring unique legends, squad-based combat, and tactical hero abilities.
about.full: Apex Legends is a free-to-play hero-based battle royale developed by Respawn Entertainment. Players compete in squads of three (and limited-time modes) using a diverse roster of legends, each with tactical, passive, and ultimate abilities. The game features large dynamic maps, intense gunplay, movement mechanics, and strategic teamwork. Apex continually evolves with seasonal updates, new legends, rotating maps, events, balance patches, and battle passes. Cross-play support allows players across platforms to compete together.

tips: Use movement techniques like sliding and bunny-hopping for better positioning.

Pick legends that complement your squad's style and abilities.
Armor swap during fights to stay alive longer.
Use high ground advantages for easier fights.
Master recoil patterns for weapons like R-301, Flatline, and R-99.
Learn map rotations to avoid third-party attacks.
Use ultimate accelerants strategically depending on your legend.
updates: New legends introduced every major season.
Frequent balance changes for weapons and abilities.
Map rotations with seasonal terrain changes.
Ranked system updated with new scoring calculations.
New cosmetic collections and mythic skins released regularly.
features: Unique legends with tactical, passive, and ultimate abilities.
Dynamic maps like Kings Canyon, World’s Edge, and Storm Point.
